Name: Green Tea Cocktail #1
Ingredients: 5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: It's green and, although it doesn't actually contain any tea, has something of the flavour of alcoholic peppermint tea.
Nutrition: One serving of Green Tea Cocktail #1 contains 189 calories
